Bloodwrath Strike.name: Bloodwrath Strike
Bloodwrath Strike.flavor: Primal fury wells within you as you slam your weapon into your foe.

Warding Frenzy.name: Warding Frenzy
Warding Frenzy.flavor: Your senses heightened by the primal spirits around you, you present a constant threat to enemies nearby and are ready to strike if they ignore you.
Warding Frenzy.effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy that starts or ends its turn adjacent to you is marked until the end of its next turn.

Form of the Primal Beast.name: Form of the Primal Beast
Form of the Primal Beast.flavor: Your body becomes a hunched thing of fur and shadow, an echo of the archetypal predator, the Primal Beast. When you muster your strength for a great attack, you deal a grievous wound to your foe.
Form of the Primal Beast.effect: You assume the guardian form of the Primal Beast until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your melee reach increases by 1, and you gain threatening reach.
Form of the Primal Beast.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Primal Beast Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Primal Beast.requirement: The Form of the Primal Beast power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Primal Beast.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
